title: Urgot and Sterak's
body: Riot, where is the Urgot buff? Sterak's (one of Urgot's core items) is useless on him now. It is the fourth most popular item to build on him, and now he shouldn't even build it :(

replies.body: There's some stuff being worked on aimed at 7.21. I imagine there will be some stuff on the PBE in the next couple of days.

Are you guys ever going to address how difficult it is to land his Q compared to how much reward you actually get for landing it? I get that you guys want to stop him from brainlessly poking you down from range, but the Q doesn't deal much damage and is nearly impossible to land. I feel like it may be a top contender for worst ability in the game. If the lock-on was only on this spell, it'd make more sense, but if he lands E, he gets the lock-on for free.
We are looking at some options around Q hittability, yes. Uncertain if that will be what ships, but that is one of the things we're looking at.
Why not just put mutliple charges on his Q? Also, would Urgot have some damage reduction or a shield to compensate sterak gage?

>
> We are looking at some options around Q hittability, yes. Uncertain if that will be what ships, but that is one of the things we're looking at.

imo just change how his q projectile works.

make it a slower projectile, but instantly pops when it collides with an enemy champion. the entire purpose of his q is really just to set up his w, and doesnt deal much damage by itself. it just needs to be a bit better at rewarding urgot for direct hits.
Thanks. IMO that spell is one of the big reasons why he's weak. It takes a lot of skill to land consistently and even then it's not worth it.
They said they would monitor him to see what happens.
